data.name: DDD East Midlands Conference 2020
data.location: Nottingham Conference Center, 30 Burton St, Nottingham NG1 4BU
data.description: A technology conference for the community, by the community. Celebrates the East Midlands tech community, businesses and talent have to offer through collaboration & innovation.

relatedRecords.name: Cambridge Wireless International Conference
relatedRecords.location: Wellcome Genome Campus Conference Centre, Hinxton, UK
relatedRecords.description: The CW International Conference (CWIC) is the flagship event for Cambridge’s world-renowned technology community. It attracts companies from across the world who want to learn from and do business with the UK’s most innovative city.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit - London
relatedRecords.description: Comsum is the Community Summit for AWS. Multi track events with talks and workshops from AWS Community Heroes and Community Members. After the talks networking with 50 classic arcade cabinets, great food and drink.
